verses.text: Then we \w turned|strong="H6437"\w*, and went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* to \w Bashan|strong="H1316"\w*: and \w Og|strong="H5747"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Bashan|strong="H1316"\w* came \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w against|strong="H7125"\w* us, he and all his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, to \w battle|strong="H4421"\w* at \w Edrei|strong="H0154"\w*.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, \w Fear|strong="H3372"\w* him not: for I will \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* him, and all his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and his \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, into thy \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*; and thou shalt \w do|strong="H6213"\w* unto him as thou \w didst|strong="H6213"\w* unto \w Sihon|strong="H5511"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w Amorites|strong="H0567"\w*, which \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* at \w Heshbon|strong="H2809"\w*.

So the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* into our \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w Og|strong="H5747"\w* also, the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Bashan|strong="H1316"\w*, and all his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: and we \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* him until none was \w left|strong="H7604"\w* to him \w remaining|strong="H8300"\w*.

And we \w took|strong="H3920"\w* all his \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* at that \w time|strong="H6256"\w*, there was not a \w city|strong="H7151"\w* which we \w took|strong="H3947"\w* not from them, \w threescore|strong="H8346"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, all the \w region|strong="H2256"\w* of \w Argob|strong="H0709"\w*, the \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w* of \w Og|strong="H5747"\w* in \w Bashan|strong="H1316"\w*.

All these \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \add were\add* \w fenced|strong="H1219"\w* with \w high|strong="H1364"\w* \w walls|strong="H2346"\w*, \w gates|strong="H1817"\w*, and \w bars|strong="H1280"\w*; beside \w unwalled|strong="H6521"\w* \w towns|strong="H5892"\w* a \w great|strong="H3966"\w* \w many|strong="H7235"\w*.

And we utterly \w destroyed|strong="H2763"\w* them, as we \w did|strong="H6213"\w* unto \w Sihon|strong="H5511"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Heshbon|strong="H2809"\w*, utterly \w destroying|strong="H2763"\w* the \w men|strong="H4962"\w*, \w women|strong="H0802"\w*, and \w children|strong="H2945"\w*, of every \w city|strong="H5892"\w*.
But all the \w cattle|strong="H0929"\w*, and the \w spoil|strong="H7998"\w* of the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, we took for a \w prey|strong="H0962"\w* to ourselves.

And we \w took|strong="H3947"\w* at that \w time|strong="H6256"\w* \w out|strong="H3947"\w* of the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w Amorites|strong="H0567"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* that \add was\add* on this \w side|strong="H5676"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*, from the \w river|strong="H5158"\w* of \w Arnon|strong="H0769"\w* unto \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Hermon|strong="H2768"\w*;

(\add Which\add* \w Hermon|strong="H2768"\w* the \w Sidonians|strong="H6722"\w* \w call|strong="H7121"\w* \w Sirion|strong="H8303"\w*; and the \w Amorites|strong="H0567"\w* \w call|strong="H7121"\w* it \w Shenir|strong="H8149"\w*;)

All the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of the \w plain|strong="H4334"\w*, and all \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*, and all \w Bashan|strong="H1316"\w*, unto \w Salchah|strong="H5548"\w* and \w Edrei|strong="H0154"\w*, \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of the \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w* of \w Og|strong="H5747"\w* in \w Bashan|strong="H1316"\w*.

For only \w Og|strong="H5747"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Bashan|strong="H1316"\w* \w remained|strong="H7604"\w* of the \w remnant|strong="H3499"\w* of \w giants|strong="H7497"\w*; behold, his \w bedstead|strong="H6210"\w* \add was\add* a \w bedstead|strong="H6210"\w* of \w iron|strong="H1270"\w*; \add is\add* it \w not|strong="H3808"\w* in \w Rabbath|strong="H7237"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ammon|strong="H5983"\w*? \w nine|strong="H8672"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* \add was\add* the \w length|strong="H0753"\w* thereof, and \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* the \w breadth|strong="H7341"\w* of it, after the \w cubit|strong="H0520"\w* of a \w man|strong="H0376"\w*.

And this \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \add which\add* we \w possessed|strong="H3423"\w* at that \w time|strong="H6256"\w*, from \w Aroer|strong="H6177"\w*, which \add is\add* by the \w river|strong="H5158"\w* \w Arnon|strong="H0769"\w*, and \w half|strong="H2677"\w* \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*, and the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* thereof, \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* I unto the \w Reubenites|strong="H7206"\w* and to the \w Gadites|strong="H1425"\w*.

And the \w rest|strong="H3499"\w* of \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*, and all \w Bashan|strong="H1316"\w*, \add being\add* the \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w* of \w Og|strong="H5747"\w*, \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* I unto the \w half|strong="H2677"\w* \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w* of \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*; all the \w region|strong="H2256"\w* of \w Argob|strong="H0709"\w*, with all \w Bashan|strong="H1316"\w*, \w which|strong="H1931"\w* was \w called|strong="H7121"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w giants|strong="H7497"\w*.

\w Jair|strong="H2971"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* all the \w country|strong="H2256"\w* of \w Argob|strong="H0709"\w* unto the \w coasts|strong="H1366"\w* of \w Geshuri|strong="H1651"\w* and \w Maachathi|strong="H4602"\w*; and \w called|strong="H7121"\w* them after his own \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, \w Bashan-havoth-jair|strong="H1316"\w*, unto this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.
And I \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w* unto \w Machir|strong="H4353"\w*.

And unto the \w Reubenites|strong="H7206"\w* and unto the \w Gadites|strong="H1425"\w* I \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* from \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w* even unto the \w river|strong="H5158"\w* \w Arnon|strong="H0769"\w* \w half|strong="H8432"\w* the \w valley|strong="H5158"\w*, and the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* even unto the \w river|strong="H5158"\w* \w Jabbok|strong="H2999"\w*, \add which is\add* the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ammon|strong="H5983"\w*;

The \w plain|strong="H6160"\w* also, and \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*, and the \w coast|strong="H1366"\w* \add thereof\add*, from \w Chinnereth|strong="H3672"\w* even unto the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* of the \w plain|strong="H6160"\w*, \add even\add* the \w salt|strong="H4417"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, under \w Ashdoth-pisgah|strong="H0798"\w* \w eastward|strong="H4217"\w*.\f + \fr 3.17 \ft Ashdoth-pisgah: or, the springs of Pisgah, or, the hill\f*

¶ And I \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* you at that \w time|strong="H6256"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w given|strong="H5414"\w* you this \w land|strong="H0776"\w* to \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* it: ye shall pass \w over|strong="H5674"\w* \w armed|strong="H2502"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* your \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, all \add that are\add* \w meet|strong="H1121"\w* for the \w war|strong="H2428"\w*.\f + \fr 3.18 \ft meet…: Heb. sons of power\f*

But your \w wives|strong="H0802"\w*, and your little \w ones|strong="H2945"\w*, and your \w cattle|strong="H4735"\w*, (\add for\add* I \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that ye have \w much|strong="H7227"\w* \w cattle|strong="H4735"\w*,) shall \w abide|strong="H3427"\w* in your \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* which I have \w given|strong="H5414"\w* you;

Until the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* have given \w rest|strong="H5117"\w* unto your \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, as well as unto you, and \add until\add* they also \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* which the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w given|strong="H5414"\w* them \w beyond|strong="H5676"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*: and \add then\add* shall ye \w return|strong="H7725"\w* every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* unto his \w possession|strong="H3425"\w*, which I have \w given|strong="H5414"\w* you.

¶ And I \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* at that \w time|strong="H6256"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Thine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* have \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* all that the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w done|strong="H6213"\w* unto these \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w*: so shall the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* unto all the \w kingdoms|strong="H4467"\w* whither thou \w passest|strong="H5674"\w*.
Ye shall not \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* them: for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w* he shall \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* for you.
And I \w besought|strong="H2603"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* at that \w time|strong="H6256"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

O \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*, thou hast \w begun|strong="H2490"\w* to \w shew|strong="H7200"\w* thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* thy \w greatness|strong="H1433"\w*, and thy \w mighty|strong="H2389"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*: for what \w God|strong="H0410"\w* \add is there\add* in \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* or in \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, that can \w do|strong="H6213"\w* according to thy \w works|strong="H4639"\w*, and according to thy \w might|strong="H1369"\w*?

I pray thee, let me go \w over|strong="H5674"\w*, and \w see|strong="H7200"\w* the \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* that \add is\add* \w beyond|strong="H5676"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*, that \w goodly|strong="H2896"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w*, and \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w*.

But the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* was \w wroth|strong="H5674"\w* with me for your sakes, and would not \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* me: and the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, Let it \w suffice|strong="H7227"\w* thee; \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* no \w more|strong="H3254"\w* unto me of this \w matter|strong="H1697"\w*.

Get thee \w up|strong="H5927"\w* into the \w top|strong="H7218"\w* of \w Pisgah|strong="H6449"\w*, and lift \w up|strong="H5375"\w* thine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w westward|strong="H3220"\w*, and \w northward|strong="H6828"\w*, and \w southward|strong="H8486"\w*, and \w eastward|strong="H4217"\w*, and \w behold|strong="H7200"\w* \add it\add* with thine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*: for thou shalt not go \w over|strong="H5674"\w* this \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*.\f + \fr 3.27 \ft Pisgah: or, the hill\f*

But \w charge|strong="H6680"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w*, and \w encourage|strong="H2388"\w* him, and \w strengthen|strong="H0553"\w* him: for he shall go \w over|strong="H5674"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* this \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and he shall cause them to \w inherit|strong="H5157"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* which thou shalt \w see|strong="H7200"\w*.
So we \w abode|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w valley|strong="H1516"\w* over \w against|strong="H4136"\w* \w Beth-peor|strong="H1047"\w*.
